detail_desc: V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some mohair with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Pull-on trousers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication at the hems.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a unicorn head at the front, wings at the sides and a faux fur tail. Anti-slip protectors on the soles.

Fitted, ribbed sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Coat in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, pleat at the back and stand up collar with wide ties at the front. Lined.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Boxy, knitted jumper with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Cheeky, bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waistband made of two wide elastic straps. Wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Maxi skirt in an airy, patterned, softly draping weave. High waist with a wide, draped, waistband and smocking and a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and ties at the sides.

V-neck blouse in soft, patterned fabric with a draped, wrapover front that has covered buttons at one side. Buttons on the inside and at the top, and long puff sleeves with reinforced shoulder sections.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Short, A-line dress in pleated chiffon with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Suit trousers in soft, patterned viscose twill with a high waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a tab and button and tapered legs with creases.

Short, boxy-style coat in twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a pleat at the back for added width. Large patch front pockets and long, wide raglan sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly and button.
Trainers in scuba fabric with imitation leather details, a strap with a hook and loop fastening and decorative flowers at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Block-patterned T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves.
High-waisted trousers in a patterned weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and wide, straight legs with a short frill at the hems. Side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a flap back pocket with a button, and legs with creases. Regular Fit.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back, narrow grosgrain shoulder straps and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, toe caps and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Microfibre push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shopper in transparent plastic with a trim, handles and shoulder strap in woven fabric. Depth 11 cm. Width 26 cm. Height 30 cm.
Wide jersey top in a cotton and modal blend with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in softly draping satin with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a narrow tie-belt at the waist.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Size approx. 16x21 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic with a square-shaped pendant. Length approx. 4 cm.
Fabric belt with an intarsia motif and an adjustable metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
V-neck jumper in a soft, loose, fine knit with crossover straps at the neckline and long sleeves.
Joggers in stretch denim. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, a fake flap pocket at the back and cuffed hems.
Brazilian briefs in stretch, supersoft jersey that moulds to the body – one size fits all. High waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
NICKI MINAJ x H&M. Socks in jacquard-patterned mesh with elasticated tops.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Hand-made, braided handbag in sturdy rope with two handles at the top. Size 32x38 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip on one side. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and plastic beads and studs all over the front.
Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in jersey.
Long-sleeved bodysuit, a pair of trousers and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Popover jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, fake buttons at the top and a diagonal zip down the front. Flap front pocket, a yoke at the back and raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Patterned lining.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch supersoft denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable elasticated waist with decorative seams at the back, a zip fly and legs with decorative seams and narrow hems.

Short, fitted dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, peak lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, discreet pockets in the side seams and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with metal D-rings. Lined.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets and slim legs with creases and slits at the hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in a woven viscose blend with a V-neck front and back and a frill trim at the hem. Lined.
V-neck top in softly draping, patterned viscose jersey with a lace yoke at the back. Short, lace butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam under the bust.
Hairbands in elasticated cotton jersey.
Fitted, strapless dress in jersey with a sheen. Pleats and a silicone trim at the top and a seam at the waist.
Tights in a soft, rib knit with an elasticated waist.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and short sleeves. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Soft jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are reinforced on the inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Straight-cut blouse in airy, flock-print organza with a collar, buttons down the front and a lined bodice. Long balloon sleeves with puffed shoulders, lined, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
